NAKB HEADQUARTERS
14 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
May 21, 1956
TO: MEMBERS OF RADIO NETWORK SCHOOL COMMITTEE
FROM: Harold E. Hill, Associate Director
RE: COMMITTEE MEETING, May 31 and June 1, 1956
We have reserved rooms for you at the Iilini Union for the nights of
Wednesday, Thursday and Friday, May 30 & 31 and June 1.
We presume that you will be arriving sometime the afternoon or evening
of the 30th. We have reserved the rooms for Friday night, too, because
some of you may not be leaving until Saturday morning.
Will you please let me know immediately when and how you plan to arrive
in Champaign, If at all possible we will try to meet your train or plane.
Even if you're driving, let me know, so I won't be worried about not
hearing from you. Also, please let me know whether or not you will be
needing a room for Friday night. In this way we can arrange the room
assignments (there will be two to a room) so that those staying until
Saturday morning can room together. DO NOT PAY FOR YOUR ROOM AT THE
UNION â€” WE WILL TAKE CARE OF THAT.
REMEMBER - IF YOU COME BY PUBLIC TRANSPORTATION (BE IT PLANE, TRAIN OR
BUS) YOU MUST USE THE TAX EXEMPT CERTIFICATES YOU WERE SENT EARLIER,
BECAUSE WE CAN NOT PAY TAX. In the space for Title, indicate that you
are an NAEB Consultant.
HEH:jy
